mapper.select: select TR.TNO, TR.SAP, TR.AAP, TR.SDT, TR.ADT, SA.NAME SAPNAME, AA.NAME AAPNAME from P0_TRVL TR JOIN P0_AP SA ON TR.SAP = SA.ANO JOIN P0_AP AA ON TR.AAP = AA.ANO

select TR.TNO, TR.SAP, TR.AAP, TR.SDT, TR.ADT, SA.NAME SAPNAME, AA.NAME AAPNAME from P0_TRVL TR JOIN P0_AP SA ON TR.SAP = SA.ANO JOIN P0_AP AA ON TR.AAP = AA.ANO JOIN P0_RSV rsv on TR.TNO = rsv.TNO where rsv.MNO = #{value} and TR.SDT > NOW()
select TR.TNO, TR.SAP, TR.AAP, TR.SDT, TR.ADT, SA.NAME SAPNAME, AA.NAME AAPNAME from P0_TRVL TR JOIN P0_AP SA ON TR.SAP = SA.ANO JOIN P0_AP AA ON TR.AAP = AA.ANO where TR.TNO = #{value}

select TR.TNO, TR.SAP, TR.AAP, TR.SDT, TR.ADT, SA.NAME SAPNAME, AA.NAME AAPNAME from P0_TRVL TR JOIN P0_AP SA ON TR.SAP = SA.ANO JOIN P0_AP AA ON TR.AAP = AA.ANO JOIN P0_RSV rsv on TR.TNO = rsv.TNO where rsv.MNO = #{value}

select TR.TNO, TR.SAP, TR.AAP, TR.SDT, TR.ADT, SA.NAME SAPNAME, AA.NAME AAPNAME from P0_TRVL TR JOIN P0_AP SA ON TR.SAP = SA.ANO JOIN P0_AP AA ON TR.AAP = AA.ANO where TR.SAP = #{startAPNo} and TR.AAP = #{arriveAPNo} and DATE(TR.SDT) = #{startDate}
SELECT DISTINCT TR.AAP, AA.NAME AAPNAME FROM P0_TRVL TR JOIN P0_AP AA ON TR.AAP = AA.ANO WHERE TR.SAP = #{no} ORDER BY AAPNAME
